proxy anony meter.description: tell you how anonumous your proxy is (transparent, anonymous or elite)

request headers.description: tell you how the server see your request header

my machine analyzer.description: tell you how the server see your machine throw your useragent

image placeholder.description: get a temporary image with your wanted dimensions and color to set it in your page faster

endpoints.name/<size>/: return a square image with random color
endpoints.name/<size>/<color>/: return a square image with specific color || color can be hex (without hashtag #) or rgb
endpoints.name/<w>*<h>/: return an image with specific width and heaight and random color
endpoints.name/<w>/<h>/: return an image with specific width and heaight and random color
endpoints.name/<w>*<h>/<color>/: return an image with specific width, heaight and color
endpoints.name/<w>/<h>/<color>/: return an image with specific width, heaight and color

dynamic user avatar.description: generate specific profile picture for every user using first letters of its name

endpoints.name/<size>/<username>/: generate profile picture with radnom color using user's first letters
endpoints.name/<size>/<username>/color: generate profile picture with specific color (hex without # or rgb) using user's first letters

thumbnail generator.description: convert image to thumbnail with custom width

image meta cleaner.description: clean image from meta data to reduce its size and make it untraceable

image base64.description: encode image to base64 string or decode

qr-code generator.description: convert any text into a qrcode

facebook user-id.description: get the id of any facebook user

cors proxy.description: give your js in the browser the ability to navigate the web, and avoid cors policy

unshorten url.description: convert shorten url to the original one
